name: Jungle Rush (telif)
description:
KNOWN BUG: Scoreboard overlaps with other elements.

Jump and run your way through the jungle!

Ground pound on enemies & consumables to gain more time!

Double jump to spray bullets in front of you! Those walls are no trouble! 

Get to the highest score with the online Leaderboard system! (uses LootLocker)

Controls:

Up arrow: Jump

Double jump: Shoot

Down Arrow (midair): Ground Pound

Ground pound on enemies to gain time and score!

Double jump to shoot and break walls!

Assets used:

Most Characters + Font by GrafxKid

The Dungeon Pack - Parallax Background by Pixfinity

Four Seasons Platformer Sprites by analogStudios_

Free Pixel Food! by Henry Software

Music from The Game Creator's Pack by Jonathan So

This is a submission to ScoreSpace Jam #19.
